abstract: NASD, a regulator of brokerage firms, said on Wednesday that Citigroup will pay $15.2 million to settle claims that its brokers had coaxed employees of BellSouth into retiring early on exaggerated projections for investment returns.
lead_paragraph: NASD, a regulator of brokerage firms, said on Wednesday that Citigroup will pay $15.2 million to settle claims that its brokers had coaxed employees of BellSouth into retiring early on exaggerated projections for investment returns.

headline.main: Citigroup and NASD Settle BellSouth Case
